items.title: Typing & entering a value which is not part of Multivalue control Extension freeze the field.
items.body:
It is observed that whenever a user feeds in any value in Multivalue control Extension field (conditon #1: which is not part of the existing list of values and condition #2: 'Allow users to enter custom values' is checked out) freeze the said field completely and moreover the feed in value is not visible to the user.

The user has no option but to refresh the page as make the said field in working state again to put the correct value.

Steps to Reproduce.
1. Consider the Multi value control extension field named "Choice" is already set with values like Yes, No, May Be. Also 'Allow users to enter custom values' is checked out at setting page.
2. On UI, try typing "Yesssssss" and hit Enter key.
3. Observe that the field "Choice" get freeze and the value "Yesssssss" is also not visible.
4. Now try to add another value using any existing value. 
5. User is unable to do so until the user refreshes the page.


Screenshot is attached here for reference.![multi value control extension field freeze issue](https://github.com/microsoft/vsts-extension-multivalue-control/assets/91320655/9a32e6d2-3859-423d-94a0-a7f9d4d8b27c)
